steps.name: Given I am on the main application page

When the condition '#{eval("｟e_nLus13su0ui_｠"=="e_nLus13su0ui_")}' is true I do
|step																						|
|When I click on element located `By.xpath(//h1[text()='｟Simple Project Board｠'])`							|
|Then the text '｟Simple Project Board｠' exists																|
When I click on element located `By.xpath(//h1[text()='Simple Project Board'])`
Total number of elements found By.xpath: //h1[text()[normalize-space()='Simple Project Board']] is equal to 1
Pass: An element with attributes XPath: '//h1[text()[normalize-space()='Simple Project Board']]'; Visibility: VISIBLE; exists
Pass: An element with attributes: ' XPath: '//h1[text()[normalize-space()='Simple Project Board']]'; Visibility: VISIBLE;' exists
Then the text 'Simple Project Board' exists
Pass: There is an element with text=Simple Project Board in the context [The condition is true]

When the condition '#{eval("｟e_nLus13su0ui_｠"=="board-tile-fade")}' is true I do
|step																						|
|When I click on element located `By.xpath(//div[text()='｟Simple Project Board｠'])`							|
|Then the text '｟Simple Project Board｠' exists																|
